queries.sql: SELECT * FROM bankmember WHERE apikey='be68YFkvztcaQGLNIXxPdA2jf3uUC79HgVBMW4KsmhwTJDSZEy'
SELECT a.currency, a.symbol, a.name, a.status FROM `tbl_currency` a WHERE a.status='active'

SELECT sum(x.amt) as amt, sum(x.cost) as cost, sum(x.fee) as fee, sum(x.referral) as referral FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(sum(amount),0) as amt, IFNULL(sum(pbs_cost+wise_cost),0) as cost, IFNULL(sum(fee),0) as fee, IFNULL(sum(referral_fee),0) as referral FROM tbl_member_topup WHERE id_member =('2516') AND currency='AED' AND is_proses='yes' UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(sum(amount)*-1,0) as amt, IFNULL(sum(pbs_cost+wise_cost),0) as cost, IFNULL(sum(fee),0) as fee, IFNULL(sum(referral_fee),0) as referral FROM tbl_member_tobank WHERE sender_id =('2516') AND currency='AED' UNION ALL SELECT 0 as amt, IFNULL(sum(pbs_cost+card_cost),0) as cost, IFNULL(sum(fee),0) as fee, 0 as referral FROM tbl_card WHERE id_member =('2516') AND currency='AED' UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(sum(amount)*-1,0) as amt, IFNULL(sum(pbs_sender_cost),0) as cost, IFNULL(sum(sender_fee),0) as fee, IFNULL(sum(referral_sender_fee),0) as referral FROM tbl_member_towallet WHERE sender_id =('2516') AND currency='AED' UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(sum(amount),0) as amt, IFNULL(sum(pbs_receiver_cost),0) as cost, IFNULL(sum(receiver_fee),0) as fee, IFNULL(sum(referral_receiver_fee),0) as referral FROM tbl_member_towallet WHERE receiver_id =('2516') AND currency='AED' UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(sum(receive),0) as amt, 0 as cost, 0 as fee, 0 as referral FROM tbl_member_swap WHERE id_member =('2516') AND target_cur='AED' UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(sum(amount-pbs_cost)*-1,0) as amt, IFNULL(sum(pbs_cost),0) as cost, fee, 0 as referral FROM tbl_member_swap WHERE id_member =('2516') AND currency='AED' UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(sum(referral_fee),0) as amt, 0 as cost, 0 as fee, 0 as referral FROM tbl_member_topup t INNER JOIN tbl_member m ON t.id_member=m.id WHERE m.id_referral =('2516') AND currency='AED' AND is_proses='yes' UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(sum(referral_fee),0) as amt, 0 as cost, 0 as fee, 0 as referral FROM tbl_member_tobank t INNER JOIN tbl_member m ON t.sender_id=m.id WHERE m.id_referral =('2516') AND currency='AED' UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(sum(referral_receiver_fee),0) as amt, 0 as cost, 0 as fee, 0 as referral FROM tbl_member_towallet t INNER JOIN tbl_member m ON t.receiver_id=m.id WHERE m.id_referral =('2516') AND currency='AED' UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(sum(referral_sender_fee),0) as amt, 0 as cost, 0 as fee, 0 as referral FROM tbl_member_towallet t INNER JOIN tbl_member m ON t.sender_id=m.id WHERE m.id_referral =('2516') AND currency='AED' ) x
